title: Shoot-out at Alair
overview: Inspired by real-life events, Shoot-out at Alair is a 2020 ZEE5 Original Telugu crime thriller series starring Meka Srikanth and Prakash Raj in the lead. Akhtar kills a policeman every year on the day of the Mecca Masjid blasts. Soon, Akhtar is encountered. However, after several years, when a policeman gets killed on the same day, IG Praveen Chand suspects Akhtar's involvement. Is Akhtar still alive?
